page.title: 15SHIPDHAM PEOPLE INTERVIEWS 1
page.content: {FARMWORKER,}his hobby is also farmwork as he keeps pigs, chickens, and bullocks on one acre. Often he starts work at 5.00a.m. and finishes at 9.00 p.m. Even though he has no spare time he said he loves his work and hobby. { {MANAGERESS OF GENERAL STORE}found the work interesting and had made many friends through working there. She could guess what many children would buy through the purchases of 2 children she knew. The store opens at 7.30a.m. and shuts at 7.30p.m., 5 people are employed on shifts. {A COAL {MERCHANT}starts work at 7.00a.m. and employs 12 people. He sells 20 different types of coal some obtained from E.Germany, Wales and the Midlands. His hobby of clay pigeon shooting has helped to advertise his business through fortunate publicity of his prowess.
